sentences.en: Compared with ADO , the way of visitation to data in ADO.
sentences.cn: ado. NET中 的数据访问方式与ado相比发生很大的变化.

sentences.en: Disease is not sent by God . It is not a visitation of Providence.
sentences.cn: 疾病不是拜上帝所赐,不是神旨的惩罚.

sentences.en: KJV Thou hast granted me life and favour, and thy visitation hath preserved my spirit.
sentences.cn: [新译]你赐我生命,又向我施慈爱, 你的眷顾保守我的心灵.

sentences.en: Over - grazing and tourist visitation are causing degeneration of the grassland in the Xilamuren area.
sentences.cn: 摘要过度放牧和旅游践踏导致了希拉穆仁草原严重的退化、沙化.

sentences.en: Plagues were for merly regarded as a visitation of God.
sentences.cn: 瘟疫从前被认为是上帝的惩罚.

sentences.en: The day of your watchmen, your visitation, has come; Now will be their confounding.
sentences.cn: 你的守望者所说降罚的日子已经来到; 他们必扰乱不安.

sentences.en: The famine was a visitation of God for their sins.
sentences.cn: 那次饥荒算是上帝对他们罪孽的惩罚.

sentences.en: The image is composed in the manner of a traditional religious painting of The Visitation.
sentences.cn: 这个画面由传统的天降祸福为主题的古典画组成.

sentences.en: The peasants thought that the storm was a visitation.
sentences.cn: 农民们认为这场暴风雨是上帝对人们的惩罚.

sentences.en: The villagers thought that the storm was a visitation of God.
sentences.cn: 村民们认为这场风暴是上帝对他们的惩罚.

sentences.en: The visitation gate closes and Abruzzi is led away.
sentences.cn: 在Abruzzi身后的门关上了,他被警卫带着离开了.

sentences.en: They had another visitation from Essex police.
sentences.cn: 埃塞克斯的警察再次拜访了他们。

sentences.en: Thou hast granted me life and favourand thy visitation hath preserved my spirit.
sentences.cn: 12你将生命和慈爱赐给我;你也眷顾保全我的心灵.

sentences.en: You have granted me life and lovingkindness, And Your visitation has preserved my spirit.
sentences.cn: 12你将生命和慈爱赐给我, 你的眷顾也保守我的灵.

words.tran_cn: 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟
访问；探视；视察；正式访问

trans.tran_cn: 访问，探望，天罚，天降的祸福
trans.tran_en: an official visit to a place or person
